content: *dcx9 sk2 dcx9 3dc * repeat *­* across to half of last chevron dcx8 decrease tiny cluster ch2 turn 128 double_crochet 3­70 repeat row 2 until the blanket measures 40 or desired length change color prior to finishing the last st tiny cluster of the row if desired pictured blanket was made with color blocks of 10 row fo weave in ends *if you have any questions or feedback please email me at ​rachelc creations@gmail com​ this pattern is created and written by ​rachelc creations​ please do not edit sell or claim this pattern as your own you may sell finished items made from this pattern credit as the original pattern creator is appreciated enjoy © 2015 rachelc creations www facebook com/rachelc creations 3
